text: What's up, everyone? Quick market update, then I'm going to talk about some GME updates as well. I'm very interested in what's going on with GameStop obviously. You can use bond futures and bonds themselves if you're inclined to calculate the market's perception and probability of perspective cuts. But you can also use this tool here and it's called the FedWatch tool. It's very, very cool. And really, I just want to show you this really quick. If you compare the probabilities, it shows you different time frames. So this shows you the current probability that shows you from a day ago, a week ago, a month ago. And this is specifically what I want to show you. If you go to 18 September, the probability of a cut has skyrocketed. This is something to be aware of because if we do get a cut, the probability is for you to see things like small caps and bonds go up. And that's what we're already starting to see.
